voiceAnswerVoice
assignments.value: =I have created a ToDo in Notion called "{{ $json.name }}".

parameters.content:
## ToDo Agent (Notion)
**Double click** to edit me. [Guide](https://docs.n8n.io/workflows/sticky-notes/)

# Reply handling
**Double click** to edit me. [Guide](https://docs.n8n.io/workflows/sticky-notes/)

## Quick reminder agent (Calendar)
**Double click** to edit me. [Guide](https://docs.n8n.io/workflows/sticky-notes/)

## Image agent
**Double click** to edit me. [Guide](https://docs.n8n.io/workflows/sticky-notes/)

categories.description: If the message is about setting a reminder, or include the word "reminder".
If the message is about task(s)/todo(s), without including a date
if the message is about an email or contains the word email
if the message is about appointments or the calendar

parameters.content:
## e-mail Agent (Gmail)
**Double click** to edit me. [Guide](https://docs.n8n.io/workflows/sticky-notes/)

filters.receivedAfter: ={{$fromAI("date","the date after which to fetch the messages in format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS")}}

parameters.subject: ={{ $fromAI("Subject", "the subject of the draft email", string) }}

categories.description: if the message is about creating a new task or todo
if the message is about getting an overview or summary of an existing task or todo (or multiple tasks or todo's)
if the user explicitly asks to update a task to done

options.systemPromptTemplate: Please classify the text provided by the user into one of the following categories: {categories}, and use the provided formatting instructions below. Don't explain, and only output the json.

parameters.content:
## Calendar Agent (Calendar)
**Double click** to edit me. [Guide](https://docs.n8n.io/workflows/sticky-notes/)

options.timeMin: ={{$fromAI("date","the date after which to fetch the messages in format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS")}}

options.systemMessage:
=You are a helpful assistant.

Today's date is {{ $now }}.

Guidelines:
- When summarizing calendar events, include as much info as possible.
- if the user did not specify a date in the request assume they are asking for the upcoming week, including today

parameters.content:
## General Agent (Wiki, Hackernews)
**Double click** to edit me. [Guide](https://docs.n8n.io/workflows/sticky-notes/)

options.systemMessage:
=You are a helpful assistant.

Today's date is {{ $now }}.

Guidelines:
- When summarizing hackernews, always include the date and time the article was created.

=You are a helpful assistant.

Today's date is {{ $now }}.

Guidelines:
- When fetching emails, filter out any promotional emails. 
- When summarizing emails, include Sender, Message date, subject, and brief summary of email.
- if the user did not specify a date in the request assume they are asking for today (from 00:00 until now)

parameters.text:
=I will provide you with a message. Your sole task is to analyse the message, and based on it's content and context, create a task

Message: {{ $json.message }}

attributes.name: eventDate
attributes.description: The extracted date & time in ISO Format (GMT +1)
